tab1.title1:
<RichColor Color="255,127,80,1">Petunias Gaming Village Small Tribes Server</>

 <RichColor Color="255,127,80,1">This server will be wiped and start fresh the evening of 12/26</>

 <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Join our Discord and introduce yourself in the Ark channel to get a free starter kit within 24 hours of posting</>
tab1.text1:
Admins are happy to help, but do have full time jobs and may not be readily available at all times.
 Open a ticket in Discord for any requests

 There will be Offline Raid Protection Starting Sunday Evening around 8pm Eastern through around Friday 6pm Eastern.

 We have added some quality of life mods to the server: Arkomatic, Teleporters, Automated Ark, Imbue and Magic Treat.

 We have adjusted the crafting recipe for Cementing Paste to 3 Stones.


 Starter kit includes Metal Pick, Metal Hatchet, Metal Pike and a Saddled Level 100 Parasaur

tab2.title1: <RichColor Color="255,127,80,1">Be respectful, This is a game for everyone to have fun</>

tab4.text1:
Welcome to Petunia Gaming Village, where gaming is more than just a hobby â€“ it's a community-driven adventure. Founded by a group of passionate gamers, Petunia Gaming Village is a haven for enthusiasts who share a love for VR, PC, and console gaming.

At Petunia Gaming Village, our primary focus is on creating a space for gamers of all backgrounds. Whether you're a seasoned player or a newcomer to the gaming world, our community is built on the principles of respect and maturity.

In addition to playing on this server the PGV community takes a unique approach by gathering members from various tribes on our server to form a temporary tribe on a random server and see just how far our collective skills can take us.

Come be a part of our ever-growing gaming family at Petunia Gaming Village, where the joy of gaming meets the warmth of community. Embrace the adventure, make memories, and let the games unite us all.
